Three people dead in two-vehicle head-on crash near Geraldine; major emergency services response https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-respond-to-serious-two-vehicle-crash-near-geraldine/MVYTPOQX2ND3HBO2JPY6XSCK2U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-respond-to-serious-two-vehicle-crash-near-geraldine/MVYTPOQX2ND3HBO2JPY6XSCK2U/ A 4WD and a people-mover were travelling in opposite directions when they collided. Wed, 21 Aug 2024 06:16:34 +0000 Three people are feared dead in a two-vehicle crash on State Highway 79 near Geraldine. Photo / George Heard
Learner driver travels 1300km to sit restricted licence test after string of failures https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/learner-driver-travels-1300km-to-sit-restricted-licence-test-after-string-of-failures/U7UQM5OCENACROUFTRLX3IPZKU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/learner-driver-travels-1300km-to-sit-restricted-licence-test-after-string-of-failures/U7UQM5OCENACROUFTRLX3IPZKU/ Raphael FranksWoman failed two tests, the third was the charm. Booking an appointment was just as hard. Wed, 21 Aug 2024 06:04:48 +0000 The 24-year-old had just taken a new job far from her home and without any convenient public transport options. The Remuera resident told the Herald she was eager to get her restricted licence as soon as possible, and the soonest available test was in Pukekohe. Photo / Jimmy Joe
Vet sector shortages hitting rural areas the hardest - study https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/vet-sector-shortages-hitting-rural-areas-the-hardest-study/BNLR62RJBVBTTC3KUGEWY2A6XI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/vet-sector-shortages-hitting-rural-areas-the-hardest-study/BNLR62RJBVBTTC3KUGEWY2A6XI/ Monique Steele'The big shortage we have, particularly in the rural sector, is experienced vets.' Wed, 21 Aug 2024 06:00:00 +0000 A report found long hours and high workloads for veterinary teams short of staff, resulted in burn-out and poor retention. Photo / 123rf

Damo’s Day fundraiser for families of men killed in fishing tragedy https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/21/damos-day-fundraiser-for-families-of-men-killed-in-fishing-tragedy/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/21/damos-day-fundraiser-for-families-of-men-killed-in-fishing-tragedy/ All Black Coles, sports personality McKay, Blues coach Cotter special guests Wed, 21 Aug 2024 03:59:33 +0000 The families of the three fishermen who lost their lives off Māhia Peninsula in June - rugby referee Damien Macpherson (pictured above), Elwood Higgins and Taina Sinoti - will receive the proceeds from the Damo's Day fundraiser on Saturday at Patutahi run by the Ngātapa Rugby and Associated Sports Club. Photo / Paul Rickard
Rāhui placed on Whanganui River for missing personhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/rahui-placed-on-whanganui-river-for-missing-person/N652REWVTZDMJD5ZZBUNANKWDM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/rahui-placed-on-whanganui-river-for-missing-person/N652REWVTZDMJD5ZZBUNANKWDM/The rāhui will remain in place until Friday.Wed, 21 Aug 2024 03:53:58 +0000 The rāhui is expected to be in place for three days.
